name: F3 - Anonymous questions, Chat
description: F3 is a social discovery app to make new friends and communicate with existing ones.   GET ANONYMOUS MESSAGES AND QUESTIONS 1) Share your link with friends 2) Let them send you anonymous messages and questions only you can see 3) Express yourself by making cool answers with photos and videos. Bring them to life with text and drawing tools.  BFF GAME: meet new people nearby and from all over the world in a very easy way.  DIRECT MESSAGES: chat with your friends privately.   Over 20 million people have already signed up for F3. Join the community now!  The app is free to download and use, however we offer optional in-app purchase called F3 Plus (premium features include: see who viewed your posts and answers, see everyone who wants to friend you on BFF game, use app without ads). If you dont choose to purchase F3 Plus, you can simply continue using F3 for free.
